Description: Glazed composition shallow bowl; mould-made; thin walled; greenish blue glaze poorly preserved; faded linear decoration in dark brown paint, dots on rim, rim interior with band of framed joining horizontal lozenges with dots in centre; interior base has traces of a bird's wing and vegetation; mended from pieces.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No.191)
